r.s: Element for HTML_QuickForm that emulate a multi-select.
r.d: The HTML_QuickForm_advmultiselect package adds an element to the HTML_QuickForm package that is two select boxes next to each other emulating a multi-select.
r.n:
* news - Introduce a TIP to make double-select-box XHTML 1.0 Strict compliant even with an empty list.
* bugs - fix #13680 : XHTML - Need to create a distinct id for all checkboxes
* changes - With default element template there is a label, that does not exist with submit button All examples uses a custom submit-element template to make them XHTML compliant.
* QA - User Guide 1.4.0 included in this release cover all versions 1.x.x see http://pear.laurent-laville.org/HTML_QuickForm_advmultiselect for more format to download.
